channel.title: Comments on: Wild Women Sometimes Get the Blues
channel.description: I give a fuck about an Oxford comma

item.title: By: http://www.soddosdlsd.com/
item.dc:creator: http://www.soddosdlsd.com/
item.description: Hey! Do you use Twitter? I'd like to follow you if that would be okay. I'm absolutely enjoying your blog and look forward to new posts.
item.content:encoded:
Hey! Do you use Twitter? I’d like to follow you if that would be
okay. I’m absolutely enjoying your blog and look forward to new posts.

item.title: By: Indiana
item.dc:creator: Indiana
item.description: I think what you said was actually very reasonable. But, think about this, suppose you composed a catchier post title? I am not saying your content isn't good., however what if you added something to maybe grab a person's attention? I mean Wild Women Sometimes Get the Blues | Notes on the wing is a little vanilla. You ought to peek at Yahoo's front page and watch how they create news titles to get viewers interested. You might add a related video or a related pic or two to get people interested about what you've got to say. Just my opinion, it could make your posts a little bit more interesting.
item.content:encoded:
I think what you said was actually very reasonable. But, think about this, suppose you
composed a catchier post title? I am not saying your
content isn’t good., however what if you added something to maybe grab a person’s attention?
I mean Wild Women Sometimes Get the Blues | Notes on the wing is a little vanilla.
You ought to peek at Yahoo’s front page
and watch how they create news titles to get viewers interested.
You might add a related video or a related pic or two to get
people interested about what you’ve got to say. Just my opinion,
it could make your posts a little bit more interesting.
